text: Intuit is a large contact center.
We host a large contact center.
We have 24 million contacts a year,

serving over 500
million minutes of phone calls.
We use Amazon Chime SDK to build what we call
as a video meeting capability,

which we offer as part
of our conversational platform.

We offer this meeting
capability to the customers
who come to contact us for help.
And we also offer this capability

for the expert and
customer to meet one-on-one.
Amazon Chime SDK had higher audio quality,

higher video quality,
better noise cancellation,
better background removal features.

And with AWS, you can
always be sure of the scalability

and the reliability,
all the nonfunctional part.
What we found that with the video meeting
we launched with Amazon Chime SDK,

that our handle
rate was seven points high.
Our TNPS was two points higher.

There was a net
cost reduction in the bill,
which we pay in our contact centers.
Amazon Chime has always innovated with us,
bringing capabilities post release,

such as multi-region and
real-time video streamings, et cetera.
So with AWS, it's always,

you can have someone to
rely on with their entire stack.
